string.text: Hey man, this made me think of you...
You know what? Thanks for the great times together, here's something for you
Do you want this? I don't have any use for it
Yooo check it! Look what I found!
Hey, found something out there. Thought it might interest you.
Here's a little something for you. Consider it a token of our adventures.
Found an interesting item. It's yours now.
Guess what I stumbled upon? It's a surprise, take it!
Found a little extra during my travels. Take this, my friend.
Got my hands on something. It's yours, no strings attached.
Gift from the Zone! Found this during my latest expedition.
Check it out! Something I found that might come in handy for you.
Found a little surprise for you. Enjoy!
Gift time, my friend! Found something useful just for you.
Spending time together increased the friendship in your squad:
